title: Richard Lefkowitz OXOniac Contest Entry
description: I've been buying my children OXO products for years! I think that OXO has the most innovative and useful ways for better than average kitchen utensils and the price is always fair. I would relish the chance to share my OXO passion with the world, and to b

asset.author: OXO
asset.hookText: I've been buying my children OXO products for years! I think that OXO has the most innovative and useful ways for better than average kitchen utensils and the price is always fair. I would relish the chance to share my OXO passion with the world, and to become the world's BIGGEST OXONIAC. I am extremely comfortable in front of the camera, I think I can represent the average male cook, and I love working with all things OXO. Sincerely, Richard Lefkowitz
